# mediaPickerDidCancel(_:)

**Instance Method**

A method that the system calls when a user taps Cancel to dismiss a media item picker.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func mediaPickerDidCancel(_ mediaPicker: MPMediaPickerController)
```

## Parameters

- **mediaPicker**: The media item picker to dismiss.

## Responding to user actions

- **mediaPicker(_:didPickMediaItems:)**: A method that the system calls when a user selects a set of media items.

items.description: A method that the system calls when a user selects a set of media items.
items.name: mediaPicker(_:didPickMediaItems:)
